programmes.show_description: Crime mystery starring Bruce Willis. A former homicide detective who turned in his partner struggles to convince his fellow officers that a policeman is a serial killer.
Aerial action featuring Bryan Cranston. When terrorists steal a bio-weapon and hi-jack the Vice President's plane to make their escape, a former marine, who created the bio-weapon must intervene.

A woman is accused of illegally using a professional photo of her grandchild to make a statement.
An attempt to reign in a roommate's sloppiness ends in an assault, an arrest and a plea bargain.
After a woman has a fight with her boyfriend, her cousin lets her move in; she accuses him of filing a false police report against her.
A woman sues her mother for custody of a dog; her mom claims her daughter didn't care for the dog on a regular basis because she was in and out of jail.
While a business owner is on vacation, his large four-wheeler is taken on a crabbing joyride and gets irreparably stuck in the mud.
A woman says she caught her live-in lover half naked, drunk and on the phone with another woman; he denies all charges including giving her a bloody nose.
A behavioural therapist passes himself off as an expert on trailer repair leaving an aspiring food truck owner with an unworkable estimate.
A Tinder date leads to a business relationship between a motivational speaker and a photographer and ends with a defamation fight.
A young man claims his aunt harassed him about his failing eyesight. He testifies against her when his girlfriend sues her for unpaid bills and moving costs.

Nanny's Nightmare: This series invites audiences into the intriguing realm of crime-solving with Steve Keogh, a detective with 30 years of experience, 12 of those as a top-tier murder detective.
Detectives Steve Keogh and Steve Whittaker discuss Aseel Al-Essaie's murder by Cohen, Gordon and Bryan. Fire, CCTV and phone experts share insights.
Prominent LA therapist Amie Harwick was murdered in February 2020. For the first time, the man who tried to save her opens up about what happened.
The investigation of a hit and run incident, in which a child was killed, leads to a convincing video reconstruction of the moment of impact.
Bad Blood: Analysing the evidence, the medical detectives solve real crimes using forensic techniques, alongside reconstructions (which may be unsuitable for younger viewers).

Chuck Norris is Walker in this modern, high-kicking martial arts western. Walker must save two orphan murder witnesses from being killed themselves before they can give testimony.
Action thriller sequel with Sylvester Stallone. Vietnam War veteran John Rambo must confront his past and unearth his ruthless combat skills to exact revenge in one final mission.
Western with Dennis Quaid. A greatly outnumbered ragtag group of Texan soldiers mounts a suicidal defence to protect a fortress from Mexican forces.
Action comedy starring Rutger Hauer. A blind Vietnam veteran trains in martial arts before returning to America, where he uses his skills to protect the son of a fellow soldier from mobsters.
Devilish frights. College student Samantha takes a babysitting job that happens to coincide with a lunar eclipse unaware that her clients are planning for her to be part of a satanic ritual.

A man claims his ex-tenant damaged his rental unit, stole property and allegedly forged documents to try and prove otherwise.
A young lawyer sues his former tenants for unpaid rent and damages to his home after complaints of strong pet odours by neighbours.
After a dispute over rent, a woman posts a video referencing a personal story that her ex-roommate had shared with her.
A salon owner for 19 years decides to start anew with fellow hair dressers; their partnership ends in a fight over allegedly stolen property and lost wages.
A sneak peek at a phone allegedly leads to an assault, false arrest and a scar on a man's face.
A woman's wild effort to pick-up her car lands her in jail for alleged assault and theft; she sues for a false arrest.
A woman is convicted of assault after cutting her daughter with a knife during an altercation over puppies; video evidence captures the bloody aftermath.
The Judge warns a grandmother about the risk of having a dangerous dog breed after her Pit Bull attacks a neighbour.
The Judge calls a man out on his inconsistent testimony when he confesses that he sold the camper trailer he's being sued for.

Stranger Danger: This series invites audiences into the intriguing realm of crime-solving with Steve Keogh, a detective with 30 years of experience, 12 of those as a top-tier murder detective.
Detectives discuss the brutal murder of Mohammed Yousaf by two greedy plotters. Experts reveal the forensic and psychological clues.
Las Vegas investigative reporter Jeff German was a local legend, but in September 2022, it was the reporter making headlines.
When a grandmother is found murdered in her hotel room, the killer wounds himself and inadvertently turns himself in.

Chuck Norris fights crime and helps the community as the eponymous Walker. The chief of the Cherokee Nation is suspected of murder...
Crime drama with Shia LaBeouf. Three brothers running a Depression-era bootlegging operation come under threat from a corrupt deputy sheriff, forcing them to fight to defend their livelihood.
Crime drama with Craig Fairbrass. When a British military contractor learns that his daughter has died, he arrives in Los Angeles to discover a stranger's body and sets out to find her.
